Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= the opening by which a person enters or exits an enclosed space, such as a house, a tent, a temple, or a larger area like a city; it can also be used figuratively to denote the mouth

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: to come out (of a certain place); hence: = process by which liquids flow from a certain place
= strip of wood or stone at the bottom of a doorway

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= process by which bodies of water flow from a higher elevation to a lower elevation
literally: shoulder; hence: = the left or right part of a construction

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= the direction facing right or southward from the perspective of the location in focus; ≈ associated with strength and therefore usually regarded as the favorite side; in extension: one option as opposed to another
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position
literally: road; hence: = a location that needs to be passed to get from one place to another
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

Node.gloss: to lead around|to cause to go around
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to move in a full or partial circle
literally: road; hence: = a location that needs to be passed to get from one place to another
= referent to the location outside of an object
= referent to the location outside of an object
literally: road; hence: = a point to or from which a person or thing moves or faces, ◄ understood as the road between that person or thing and the point in focus
literally: shoulder; hence: = the left or right part of a construction

= the direction facing right or southward from the perspective of the location in focus; ≈ associated with strength and therefore usually regarded as the favorite side; in extension: one option as opposed to another

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= line ► used for measuring the size of an object; ≈ sometimes used in a figurative sense in the context of moral and ethical standards

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= causative action by which humans mark off part of a larger unit for a certain purpose
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm
= joint connecting the foot to the leg
= causative action by which humans mark off part of a larger unit for a certain purpose
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= causative action by which humans mark off part of a larger unit for a certain purpose
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= causative action by which humans mark off part of a larger unit for a certain purpose
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

Node.gloss: to grow|to become tall|to become high|to rise
Node.definition: = process by which plants and other inanimate objects increase in height
= action by which humans move forward through water with the help of their arms and legs
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= member of a larger group of related people or objects, ◄ referred to as a child of that larger group
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= causative action or process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to move forward, usually towards a specific destination

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: to come out (of a certain place); hence: = process by which liquids flow from a certain place
= a territorial division
= state in which land is located to the east of the speaker
= process by which bodies of water flow from a higher elevation to a lower elevation

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them

Node.gloss: to bring out|to cause to flow
Node.definition: literally: to bring out (of a certain place); hence: = causative process by which humans or deities cause liquids to flow from a certain place
literally: to be healed; hence: = process by which objects are restored to their former state, usually by human or divine intervention
= a living creature, including both humans and animals, as defined by the life principle that animates it

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: to be healed; hence: = process by which objects are restored to their former state, usually by human or divine intervention

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= a person who catches fish for a living
= oasis, also known as Hazezon Tamar (חַצְצֹן תָּמָר) ◄ located in the wilderness (מִדְבָּר) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) on western shore of Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= spring; ◄ near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)

= long net hanging vertically in the water with floats at the upper edge and weights at the lower edge; ► drawn in by men working in boats or from shore; as the ends are drawn together to the boat or drawn ashore, fish are trapped in the area enclosed by the net; drawn in immediately after it has been spread out; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= a group of items, such as plants or animals, sharing similar characteristics

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

= collective designation of various cold blooded, aquatic vertebrates, having gills, usually fins, and typically an elongated body covered with scales; or, in a loosely sense, any of various other aquatic animals; ► an important source of food

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
= state in which objects or events are numerous in quantity or frequency
= an area of low lying land which is flooded in wet seasons or at high tide, and typically remains waterlogged at all times; a place where reeds (קָנֶה) and papyrus (גֹּמֶא) grow
= a depression at the bottom of a waterbody, ► where water can still be found even when most of the water has dried up
literally: to be healed; hence: = process by which objects are restored to their former state, usually by human or divine intervention
= white crystalline substance, mainly consisting of sodium chloride; ► normally used for seasoning or preserving food; ≈ associated with infertility of the soil but also with permanence
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= process by which a plant,or part of a plant, comes up from the ground or grows from a stalk
= any kind of tall, woody plant that grows from a single trunk and with several lateral branches that often bear leaves and fruit
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

= process by which plants and their products become devoid of moisture, and therefore lose color and bend over ► which may ultimately result in death if circumstances do not change; ≈ associated with drought and destruction, often as punishment from God

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= to produce fruits early in a season; ≈ which are specially regarded and looked after, both because of taste and earliness
= place that has been consecrated to a deity, where that deity is said to reside and is worshiped
literally: to come out (of a certain place); hence: = process by which liquids flow from a certain place
= produce from crop bearing trees and plants
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth

= one of the expanded, usually green structures growing from the stem of a plant; ► providing shade; ≈ associated with life when green, but known to wither when disconnected from the plant and therefore also denoting the fragility of life

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to give in possession|to will (one's) property
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities give land and other possessions to (other) humans as their permanent possession, with equal focus on the recipients and on the object that is being divided

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= piece of land; ► owned or occupied by an individual or a group of people
= action by which humans or deities take permanent possession of objects, humans, or property, either by inheritance or force

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

Node.gloss: a man ... his brother > one ... each other
Node.definition: = expression denoting a situation in which two people or objects that are regarded as masculine are involved in a reciprocal event
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to lift up (one's) hands; hence: = action by which someone takes an oath

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: to lift up (one's) hands; hence: = action by which deities make a solemn promise, invoking themselves as a witness by lack of a higher power, which, in the case of humans, is usually done while raising one's hand
= indirect male progenitor
literally: to fall (to someone); hence: = process by which land becomes someone's property

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

= one of the sides or corners of an object
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: the sea; hence: = a large body of salt water located between Europe and Africa, west of Canaan/Israel
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
= town or village; ◄ at northern boundary of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= town; ◄ located on northern boundary of Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל> perhaps 105 km. northeast of Damascus (דַּמֶּשֶׂק) ► part of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) only during the reigns of David (דָּוִד) and Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) envisaged as part of the restored nation in Ezekiel (יְחֶזְקֵאל) vision
= town, area; ◄ on Orontes river in Syria (אֲרָם) ► capital of Aramean (אֲרַמִּי) kingdom; its inhabitants were relocated to Samaria (שֹׁמְרֹון) by the king of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר)
= town; perhaps to be identified with Berothai (בֵּרֹתַי) ◄ located on the northern border of the land of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) according the vision of the prophet (נָבִיא) Ezekiel (יְחֶזְקֵאל)
= town; ◄ between Damascus (דַּמֶּשֶׂק) and Hamath (חֲמָת) Syria (אֲרָם)
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= the area separating two or mores locations
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

m.definition: = location; ◄ on the border of Hauran (חַוְרָן)

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which males among humans and animals generate offspring
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= person born in the land, as opposed to the resident alien (גֵּר)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
literally: to fall (to someone); hence: = process by which land becomes someone's property
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

= state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time; ≈ regarded as one of the weaker classes within the society and should therefore receive special care, together with the widows, the fatherless, and other people who are poor
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
